# bastion_group (Resource)

Manages a Bastion group



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group` (String) The name of the Bastion group
- `owner` (String) The initial owner of the Bastion group (only used during creation)

### Optional

- `key_algo` (String) The SSH key algorithm for the group's initial key. Valid values: ed25519, rsa2048, rsa4096, rsa8192, ecdsa256, ecdsa384, ecdsa521. Defaults to ed25519. This value is only used during creation and cannot be changed afterward.

### Read-Only

- `aclkeepers` (List of String) The ACL keepers of the Bastion group
- `gatekeepers` (List of String) The gatekeepers of the Bastion group
- `members` (List of String) The members of the Bastion group
- `owners` (List of String) The owners of the Bastion group
